quest.name: Thoughts and Prayers
journal:
 Quest Sync
The humble shaman offers you a warm smile.
objectives: Slay a djinn for its core.
Deliver the tear of Yx'Lokwa and core of the djinn to the humble shaman.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: Tell me, do you believe in the power of prayer?

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: Would you do me the honor of joining me in a small prayer for good fortune?

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: I intend to pray to the gods for good fortune. I would be most honored if you joined me.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: We require two offerings to ensure our words reach to the heavens─a tear of Yx'Lokwa, and the heart of a djinn.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: But your prayers are between you and the gods alone. As such, I cannot help you in preparing these offerings.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: I will await your return. May the blessings of the wood keep you safe.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: Procure a tear of Yx'Lokwa and the heart of a djinn, and we may deliver your prayers unto the heavens.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: You have prepared your offerings, then?

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: Now, we take the tears in hand, like so. We then use the heart of the djinn to summon a breeze to carry the tears─and our prayers─into the firmament.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: Even now I can feel the gods' protection.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: I suspect you will have need of it in the days ahead.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: I suspect you will have need of it in the Qitana Ravel.

dialogue.name: CHARMER03475
dialogue.text: This too may prove useful in your travels. Until we meet again.
